actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, with respect to the disclosure of statistical information regarding Veterans' Administration health-care programs.

summary.text: Revises Federal provisions concerning the confidentiality of certain medical records of the Veterans Administration to allow for the disclosure of purely statistical information regarding VA health-care programs.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, with respect to the disclosure of statistical information regarding Veterans' Administration health-care programs.
